item.title: Maharishi Valmiki: Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah Renames ST Schools and Raichur University After Maharishi Valmiki
item.description: <![CDATA[Bengaluru: Karnataka chief minister Siddaramaiah onThursday said all Scheduled Tribe (ST) residential schools in the state, along with Raichur University , will be renamed after Maharishi Valmiki .He made the announcement after garlanding the statue of Maharishi Valmiki in honour of Valmiki Jayanti at Legislators' House in Vidhana Soudha. Maharishi Valmiki, revered as the first author of Hindu epic Ramayana in Sanskrit, is considered a saintly figure.Siddaramaiah said, "It is my wish the name an...]]>
item.author: Tnn
